RuleSet.Name: schema/dbcreate/pgsql/crsp_is_tenant_user.pgsql
RuleSet.GenRule: select false into retval; for cur in select susr.secuserid from $lower DbSchemaName$.SecUser as susr where susr.secuserid = argSecUserId and susr.login_id = 'system' union select smemb1.secuserid from $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecGrp sgrp1 inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecMemb smemb1 on smemb1.tenantid = sgrp1.tenantid and smemb1.tsecgroupid = sgrp1.tsecgroupid where sgrp1.tenantid = argTenantId and sgrp1.safe_name = argSecGroupName and smemb1.secuserid = argSecUserId

union select smemb2.secuserid from $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecGrp sgrp2 inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc2a on sinc2a.tenantid = sgrp2.tenantid and sinc2a.tsecgrpid = sgrp2.tsecgroupid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecMemb smemb2 on smemb2.tenantid = sinc2a.tenantid and smemb2.tsecgroupid = sinc2a.incgrpid where sgrp2.tenantid = argTenantId and sgrp2.safe_name = argSecGroupName and smemb2.secuserid = argSecUserId

union select smemb3.secuserid from $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecGrp sgrp3 inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc3a on sinc3a.tenantid = sgrp3.tenantid and sinc3a.tsecgrpid = sgrp3.tsecgroupid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc3b on sinc3b.tenantid = sinc3a.tenantid and sinc3b.tsecgrpid = sinc3a.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecMemb smemb3 on smemb3.tenantid = sinc3b.tenantid and smemb3.tsecgroupid = sinc3b.incgrpid where sgrp3.tenantid = argTenantId and sgrp3.safe_name = argSecGroupName and smemb3.secuserid = argSecUserId

union select smemb4.secuserid from $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecGrp sgrp4 inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc4a on sinc4a.tenantid = sgrp4.tenantid and sinc4a.tsecgrpid = sgrp4.tsecgroupid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc4b on sinc4b.tenantid = sinc4a.tenantid and sinc4b.tsecgrpid = sinc4a.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc4c on sinc4c.tenantid = sinc4b.tenantid and sinc4c.tsecgrpid = sinc4b.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecMemb smemb4 on smemb4.tenantid = sinc4c.tenantid and smemb4.tsecgroupid = sinc4c.incgrpid where sgrp4.tenantid = argTenantId and sgrp4.safe_name = argSecGroupName and smemb4.secuserid = argSecUserId

union select smemb5.secuserid from $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecGrp sgrp5 inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc5a on sinc5a.tenantid = sgrp5.tenantid and sinc5a.tsecgrpid = sgrp5.tsecgroupid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc5b on sinc5b.tenantid = sinc5a.tenantid and sinc5b.tsecgrpid = sinc5a.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc5c on sinc5c.tenantid = sinc5b.tenantid and sinc5c.tsecgrpid = sinc5b.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc5d on sinc5d.tenantid = sinc5c.tenantid and sinc5d.tsecgrpid = sinc5c.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecMemb smemb5 on smemb5.tenantid = sinc5d.tenantid and smemb5.tsecgroupid = sinc5d.incgrpid where sgrp5.tenantid = argTenantId and sgrp5.safe_name = argSecGroupName and smemb5.secuserid = argSecUserId

union select smemb6.secuserid from $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecGrp sgrp6 inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc6a on sinc6a.tenantid = sgrp6.tenantid and sinc6a.tsecgrpid = sgrp6.tsecgroupid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc6b on sinc6b.tenantid = sinc6a.tenantid and sinc6b.tsecgrpid = sinc6a.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc6c on sinc6c.tenantid = sinc6b.tenantid and sinc6c.tsecgrpid = sinc6b.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc6d on sinc6d.tenantid = sinc6c.tenantid and sinc6d.tsecgrpid = sinc6c.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc6e on sinc6e.tenantid = sinc6d.tenantid and sinc6e.tsecgrpid = sinc6d.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecMemb smemb6 on smemb6.tenantid = sinc6e.tenantid and smemb6.tsecgroupid = sinc6e.incgrpid where sgrp6.tenantid = argTenantId and sgrp6.safe_name = argSecGroupName and smemb6.secuserid = argSecUserId

union select smemb7.secuserid from $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecGrp sgrp7 inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc7a on sinc7a.tenantid = sgrp7.tenantid and sinc7a.tsecgrpid = sgrp7.tsecgroupid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc7b on sinc7b.tenantid = sinc7a.tenantid and sinc7b.tsecgrpid = sinc7a.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc7c on sinc7c.tenantid = sinc7b.tenantid and sinc7c.tsecgrpid = sinc7b.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc7d on sinc7d.tenantid = sinc7c.tenantid and sinc7d.tsecgrpid = sinc7c.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc7e on sinc7e.tenantid = sinc7d.tenantid and sinc7e.tsecgrpid = sinc7d.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc7f on sinc7f.tenantid = sinc7e.tenantid and sinc7f.tsecgrpid = sinc7e.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecMemb smemb7 on smemb7.tenantid = sinc7f.tenantid and smemb7.tsecgroupid = sinc7f.incgrpid where sgrp7.tenantid = argTenantId and sgrp7.safe_name = argSecGroupName and smemb7.secuserid = argSecUserId

union select smemb8.secuserid from $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecGrp sgrp8 inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc8a on sinc8a.tenantid = sgrp8.tenantid and sinc8a.tsecgrpid = sgrp8.tsecgroupid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc8b on sinc8b.tenantid = sinc8a.tenantid and sinc8b.tsecgrpid = sinc8a.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc8c on sinc8c.tenantid = sinc8b.tenantid and sinc8c.tsecgrpid = sinc8b.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc8d on sinc8d.tenantid = sinc8c.tenantid and sinc8d.tsecgrpid = sinc8c.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc8e on sinc8e.tenantid = sinc8d.tenantid and sinc8e.tsecgrpid = sinc8d.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc8f on sinc8f.tenantid = sinc8e.tenantid and sinc8f.tsecgrpid = sinc8e.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecInc sinc8g on sinc8g.tenantid = sinc8f.tenantid and sinc8g.tsecgrpid = sinc8f.incgrpid inner join $lower DbSchemaName$.TSecMemb smemb8 on smemb8.tenantid = sinc8g.tenantid and smemb8.tsecgroupid = sinc8g.incgrpid where sgrp8.tenantid = argTenantId and sgrp8.safe_name = argSecGroupName and smemb8.secuserid = argSecUserId
